View

Class EditMap.EditPane.iconHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • View.EditMap.EditPane.iconHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    EditMap.EditPane

    public class EditMap.EditPane.iconHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    It is a mouse listener class for all country labels all country label could drag, add, delete, and be connected each other.

      iconHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      void addLine(java.lang.String start, java.lang.String end)
      This method creates a line between countries.
      void deleteLine(java.lang.String target)
      This method could delete line when delete a country, all the line that connects the deleted country would be removed.
      void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      The method could drag the country on the JFrame.
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e) 
      void PaintLine(java.lang.String target)
      When the mouse drags the country, the connected line should move at same time.
